name: Extreme Car Drifting Simulator
description:
Have you ever wanted to build your own Drift Car? Now here is your chance to customize your favourite car and take it out on the track for some drifting.Drive fast cars, drift fast and hard in an all-new action car drifting.become a professional drifter and to become rich! Jump off the ramps and perform rolls over the edge of a stunt.

Game Features:

- Different sprayers for vehicle painting
- Realistic car models
- Robust steering wheel, buttons and touch steering
- Easy and realistic driving experience
- Interesting HD graphics
- Improved drift physics
